basics-booleans_key3: Binary numbers are known as machine language or low level language, binary numbers are made of 0 and 1 which humans cannot understand but computers can.
basics-booleans_key4: Limor, founder of Adafruit Industries which is one of the best sellers of electronics components, parts, tools, microcontrollers and many more. Federico is a software developer at Microsoft, one of the current tech giants. Lets hear from Limor and Federico in the following video about how computers works on 0s and 1s, and how computers understands commands given by us through lines of code.
basics-booleans_key5: Interpreter
basics-booleans_key6:
It checks the code line by line and the line at which error is present, interpreter stops the code at that line and shows the name of error.
Interpreter converts high level language to low level language with the help of which the computer is able to run the code.
basics-booleans_key7: Interpreter is used for Python and Ruby programming languages.
basics-booleans_key10: NameError: "<string>",name 'megha' is not defined;
basics-booleans_key11: In this example you saw that I have taken a variable named a and assigned/given a string value to it but I forgot to put " "(quote). So, python was not able to identify the type of value I gave to the variable a. Therefore, the interpreter stopped the code at the line that contained error, and displayed the error.
basics-booleans_key12: Compiler
basics-booleans_key13:
Compiler is a software that scans the complete code in one go and if the code contains any error, then it shows the error at the end of the code.
Whereas the interpreter, stops the code at the line that contains error.
basics-booleans_key14: Compiler is used in C and C++ programming languages.
basics-booleans_key16: To study Compiler and Interpreter in detail please click this link. Compiler and Interpreter
basics-booleans_key17: Case Sensitive
basics-booleans_key18: Case sensitive means that the text that we have typed should be exactly same as we type it anywhere in the code.
basics-booleans_key21: Var is not defined
basics-booleans_key22: For example ,in the above example ,we have assigned a variable named var and while printing we typed Var, so an error was displayed because in python var and Var are different. In python small letters and capital letters are considered different.
basics-booleans_key23: Note- You can click this link to study case sensitive in detail . Case Sensitive
basics-booleans_key24: Error/ Bugs
basics-booleans_key25: When we make any mistake while writing the code, that mistake is called error/bug.
basics-booleans_key28: SyntaxError: unexpected EOF while parsing
basics-booleans_key31: SyntaxError: invalid syntax
basics-booleans_key32: In this example you saw that while printing I forgot to put parenthesis so it showed us a syntax error which means our code has some mistake/error.
basics-booleans_key34: Debug means to solve bug/error in the given code or removing the error from the code and writing the correct code which is as per the syntax.
basics-booleans_key37: 5
basics-booleans_key40: 2
basics-booleans_key41: As you saw in the bug example there was a bug present in the second code so we debugged that code.
basics-booleans_key42: Source code
basics-booleans_key43: Source code is that code which humans can easily understand.
basics-booleans_key46: python
basics-booleans_key47: In this example you saw that we have taken a variable named as name and we have stored python in it.Ypu can easily read and understand this code .This code is called source code/ main code.
